comments: Number of operations of addition and multiplication needed to evaluate a determinant of order n by cofactor expansion.
references: C. Dubbs and D. Siegel, Computing determinants, College Math. J., 18 (1987), 48-49.
A. R. Pargeter, The vanishing coffee morning, Math. Gaz., 76 (1992), 386-387.
P. G. Sawtelle, The ubiquitous e, Math. Mag., 49 (1976), 244-245. [From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 29 2009]
